summary:
After obtaining my diploma of Industrial Engineering at Mines Albi School in 2019, I went to live and work abroad in order to have an experience both cultural and profesionnal. 
Therefore, I chose to do a Volontariat International en Entreprise (VIE). This experience let me live into two different countries (Czech Republic and Spain);  improve my English and Spanish and even try to learn Czech; develop my international mindset; meet and be regularly in contact with people all around the world (15 different nationalities); work in a sector (automobile) and a field (IT development) that I had no experience before. This was a great experience and I really liked to have this international mindset for both human and profesional aspects.
Now, after two years of VIE, since October 2021, I am working as a Digital Project Engineer Consultant for the same company. As my contract is about to end in February 2022, I am looking for a position in IT related to Project Management/ User Experience projects / Indsutry 4.0 and which will enable me to keep this International aspect.
I am opened to any position in Europe !

education.degree_name: Intensive Preparation for the national competitive exams to French engineering school
Passed the Scientific Baccalaureate with Honors (French university entry-level exam)

profile_positions.title: Digital Project Engineer
VIE - Program & Launch Support
Quality Intern

profile_positions.description:
Subject: Construction of process documents - Continuous Improvement
My mission consisted in the analysis of technical processes in order to design process documents for operators. I was regularly in the shops, in contact with operators to gather data and create the process documents. I was in contact with HSE, Quality and Production managers to validate the documents. Regular reporting with Continuous Improvement manager.
- Analyzed technical processes 
- Collected and synthesized information from operators 
- Designed process documents 
- Used Piping and Instrumentation Diagram 

Skills: communication, team work, Adobe Photoshop Element, Word, project management, analysis of technical processes, continuous improvement
profile_positions.title: Intern as an Engineer Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Subject: Warm up natural gas 
- Relied on a Design Thinking Approach
- Worked in a team of seven and regularly in relation with the company, its clients and investors
- Suggested a prototype to potential users 
- Used the Brainstorming Method 
We had to help the company find an efficient solution to warm up natural gas.
profile_positions.title: School project in collaboration with the company PGME

profile_positions.description:
- Prepared animal marking pincers 
- Assembled marking harmers 
- Checked the quality of the products 

Skills: Adaptability, rapidity, efficiency
profile_positions.title: Intern as an operator
